item.title: Research
item.description: a.author{ color: grey; } a.primary{ font-weight: bold; } Refereed Publications Adam Marrs, Josef Spjut, Holger Gruen, Rahul Sathe, Morgan McGuire; Adaptive Temporal Antialiasing, High-Performance Graphics (HPG 2018), Vancouver, August 10-12, 2018. paper alternate Bibtex@inproceedings{marrsspjut18, author = { Adam Marrs and Josef Spjut and Holger Gruen and Rahul Sathe and Morgan McGuire }, title = { {Adaptive Temporal Antialiasing} }, year = {2018}, booktitle = {High-Performance Graphics (HPG 2018)} } Konstantin Shkurko, Tim Grant, Erik Brunvand, Daniel Kopta, Josef Spjut, Elena Vasiou, Ian Mallett, Cem Yuksel; SimTrax: Simulation Infrastructure for Exploring Thousands of Cores, ACM Great Lakes Symposium on VLSI, May 23-25, 2018.
